column2: solv1 <- ggplot(data = LRRK2, aes(x = Position, y = `Solvent-accessible Reduction Ratio`)) + geom_step(size = 0.25)  + scale_x_continuous(name = "Amino Acid Number", limits = c(0, 2527), breaks = seq(0, 2527, by = 30)) + theme(aspect.ratio = 0.1) +  geom_point(data = vars, aes(x = vars$`AA Num`, y = vars$`Solvent-Accessible Reduction Ratio`, col = "red", text = paste("Variant:", vars$Variant)))
solve <-ggplotly(p = solv1, layerData = 2, tooltip = c("text", "`Solvent-accessible Reduction Ratio`" ))
